body_html:
I'm curious to know about the difficulties of implementing an histogram. Can we split the data in tiles, Have multiple histograms and then just sum them ?
…
On Tue, 5 Jun 2018, 21:23 Tongzhou Wang, ***@***.***> wrote: Let's investigate supporting this once #6688 <#6688> is merged. @mario98 <https://github.com/mario98> histogram on GPU is really difficult. If you want this get prioritized, please just say so. There is no need to blame devs on working on other changes that, while may be BC breaking, are also and may be more important. — You are receiving this because you commented. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub <#1382 (comment)>, or mute the thread <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AB7HG62nx1bcHVX2mhjH7vMswDgeu_LAks5t5y8DgaJpZM4NKjhA> .
body_text:
I'm curious to know about the difficulties of implementing an histogram.
Can we split the data in tiles, Have multiple histograms and then just sum
them ?
…
On Tue, 5 Jun 2018, 21:23 Tongzhou Wang, ***@***.***> wrote:
 Let's investigate supporting this once #6688
 <#6688> is merged.

 @mario98 <https://github.com/mario98> histogram on GPU is really
 difficult. If you want this get prioritized, please just say so. There is
 no need to blame devs on working on other changes that, while may be BC
 breaking, are also and may be more important.

 —

body:
I'm curious to know about the difficulties of implementing an histogram.
Can we split the data in tiles, Have multiple histograms and then just sum
them ?

On Tue, 5 Jun 2018, 21:23 Tongzhou Wang, <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Let's investigate supporting this once #6688
> <https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/6688> is merged.
>
> @mario98 <https://github.com/mario98> histogram on GPU is really
> difficult. If you want this get prioritized, please just say so. There is
> no need to blame devs on working on other changes that, while may be BC
> breaking, are also and may be more important.
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you commented.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/1382#issuecomment-394909858>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AB7HG62nx1bcHVX2mhjH7vMswDgeu_LAks5t5y8DgaJpZM4NKjhA>
> .
